name: Definition
text:
ARTICLE 7.  SAVINGS AND LOAN ASSOCIATIONS
 
PART I.  GENERAL PROVISIONS
 
     §412:7-100  Definition.  In this article, "savings and loan association" means a corporation that has the authority to operate as a savings and loan association under this chapter. [L 1993, c 350, pt of §1; am L 2006, c 228, §37]
